item.title: Things I Do On Focal Fossa
item.author: mail@khusika.com (Khusika Dhamar Gusti)
item.description: Ubuntu 20.04 was released on 2020 and it brings plenty of new features. In this article, i will share some of Focal Fossa configuration for personal use.
